import React, { useState, useEffect, useContext } from 'react';

        'is_published',

        'lang',
        'activity_state',
        'partner_latitude',
        'payment_token_count',
        'avatar_512',
        'email',
        'function',
        'message_bounce',
        'days_sales_outstanding',
        'partner_share',
        'credit',
        'signup_token',
        'tz',
        'create_date',
        'complete_name',
        'message_needaction_counter',
        'has_unreconciled_entries',
        'ref',
        'message_needaction',

        'im_status',

        'vat',
        'invoice_ids',

        'peppol_eas',

        'message_has_error_counter',

        'user_ids',
        'task_ids',
        'message_ids',
        'property_payment_term_id',
